General.Name: Fire & Gas Detection Technologies Ltd
General.Description: Fire & Gas Detection Technologies Ltd, together with its subsidiary, engages in the development, production, and marketing of fire and gas detectors in Belgium. Its products are used by chemical and petrochemicals, refineries, and fuel companies. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Ashkelon, Israel.

3.Name: Mr. Oded  Spector
3.Title: VP of Technology, Chief Scientist & Director
